entry.title: Use python script to synchronize two folders
entry.content: Recently i travel to YunNan province.when i come back i found a have a lot of photo file need to back up to two different hard disk.previous i just simply copy and paste.it will cause a long time process and some time make a mistake.Recently i’m learning python and i want to have a opportunity to take a practice.googing and found a little python script can done this.i just modify a little bit and it work for me .share to someone need it :D.
